Commands.Stone: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Delays target by 1 turn.
Commands.Medica II: Raises own BRV by 20%.  Raises all allies' BRV by 60% of user's current BRV.
Commands.BRV Heal: Raises own BRV based on Max BRV  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Pulse of Life: Restores all party members' HP based on Max HP and revives them if KOed  Raises party BRV based on Max BRV  Grants 「Medium Max BRV Up」 to party for 8 turns  Grants 「BRV Regen」 to self for 8 turns   After using 「Pulse of Life」:  - 「Stone」 and 「Medica II」 each recover 1 use (up to the initial values)   Turns 「HP Attack」 to 「HP Attack+」 for 8 turns  　∟ Raises allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt

Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Stone Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Stone.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Medica II Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Medica II.
Passives.Medica II Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Medica II.
Passives.Stone Charge: Increases the max uses of Stone by 1.
Passives.Stone Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Stone.
Passives.Medica II Charge: Increases the max uses of Medica II by 1.
Passives.Presence of Mind: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn when BRV equals 0.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Stone Extend: Increases Stone's max uses by 2.Increases its number of hits to 2.Moderately raises its total potency.BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 120% of Max BRV.Grants BRV Regen for 5 turns.Turns Stone to Stone+ when BRV is over 30% Max BRV.Stone+ raises BRV based on Initial BRV before the BRV hits, triggers an HP attack after use and has lower Action Delay.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ after using Stone or Stone+.BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT magic BRV attack that raises BRV based on Initial BRV.
Passives.Buff Base&Boost Up: Moderately raises Initial BRV and greatly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Medica II Extend: Raises BRV based on Initial BRV before applying the BRV multiplier.Slightly raises the BRV multiplier.Grants Medium Max BRV Up to all allies and slightly raises the BRV Gain granted by Medica II.
Passives.Resonance of Bravery and Destruction: Raises party's Initial BRV and Max BRV by 10%.
Passives.BRV Heal Extend: When using  BRV Heal :- Slightly raises party Max BRV for 3 turns

Weapons.Omnirod CP: 35: Raises the BRV gain of Medica II.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 5 turns.
Weapons.Staff of the Mirage of a Conjurer CP: 15: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Stone  and  Stone+ Moderately raises BRV gained after using  Medica
Weapons.Aymur CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Pulse of Life
Weapons.Thyrus CP: 15: Increases Stone's potency.Inflicts Small Defense Down for 1 turn upon using Stone.
